title: EcoMap
subtitle: Hackathon
about: EcoMap is an innovative web application bringing critical energy information to a wide audience. With updating statistics gathered through multiple decades, EcoMap delivers the important data to consumers.

title: Mission:Citizen
subtitle: Web Design
about: Mission: Citizen is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to helping future US citizens pass the naturalization exam and become effective citizens. They offer citizenship classes at Sherwood Library, Roosevelt High School, and Beaverton City Library in three 10 week terms throughout the year.

title: M:C Online
subtitle: Web Development
about: Mission:Citizen's online learning platform that allows students to learn and prepare for the naturalization test from anywhere. Students can watch pre-recorded videos of teachers going over each lesson and complete quizzes to test their knowledge, all at their own pace.

title: Bobo Tea House
subtitle: Web Development
about: A website for Bobo Tea House, a locally bubble tea shop located in Hillsboro, Oregon.

title: Riemann Sums
subtitle: Math
about: This program calculates and models Riemann Sums and numeric integrals.

title: MarketPush
subtitle: Internship
about: MarketPush is a B2B Marketplace platform which allows manufacturers to effortlessly implement a multi-vendor marketplace. Designed to streamline your dropship, marketplace, or vendor direct ship programs, reducing the resources needed to onboard new suppliers and products.

title: Carbon Calculator
subtitle: Hackathon
about: Carbon Calculator is a web application designed to aid the user in decreasing their carbon footprint, discover where and when you emit the most CO2, and see how you can prevent or offset that amount.
